HOTSPOT.NAME: Visible Always
HOTSPOT.CAPTION: This hotspot is always visible!
HOTSPOT.TOOLTIP: ZMIN and ZMAX are both set to 0

HOTSPOT.NAME: Visible At Initial Zoom
HOTSPOT.CAPTION: This Hotspot Is Visible%0D%0AAt Initial Zoom
HOTSPOT.TOOLTIP: ZMIN and ZMAX are both set to -1

HOTSPOT.NAME: Visible Up To 50% Zoom
HOTSPOT.CAPTION: This Hotspot Is Visible%0D%0AUp To 50% Zoom - Inclusive
HOTSPOT.TOOLTIP: ZMIN and ZMAX are set to 0 and 50

HOTSPOT.NAME: Visible Only At 50% Zoom - On Rollover
HOTSPOT.CAPTION: This Rollover Hotspot Is Visible%0D%0AIf Rolled Over%0D%0AOnly At 50% Zoom
HOTSPOT.TOOLTIP: ROLLOVER is set to 1 and ZMIN and ZMAX are both set to 50

HOTSPOT.NAME: Visible Over 50% Zoom
HOTSPOT.CAPTION: This Hotspot Is Visible%0D%0AOver 50% Zoom - Inclusive
HOTSPOT.TOOLTIP: ZMIN and ZMAX are set to 50 and 0

HOTSPOT.NAME: Visible Over 50% And Under 75% Zoom
HOTSPOT.CAPTION: This Hotspot Is Visible%0D%0ABetween 50% And 75% Zoom - Not Inclusive
HOTSPOT.TOOLTIP: ZMIN and ZMAX are set to 50.1 and 74.9

HOTSPOT.NAME: Visible At 100% Zoom
HOTSPOT.CAPTION: This Hotspot Is Visible%0D%0AOnly At 100% Zoom
HOTSPOT.TOOLTIP: ZMIN and ZMAX are both set to 100
